remarks: Transfer existential uniqueness from a variable ` x ` to another variable ` y ` contained in expression ` A ` .  Use ~ reuhyp to eliminate the second hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-2004.)
statement:
reuxfr.1 $e |- ( y e. B -> A e. B ) $.
reuxfr.2 $e |- ( x e. B -> E! y e. B x = A ) $.
reuxfr.3 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
reuxfr $p |- ( E! x e. B ph <-> E! y e. B ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x y $.
$d ph y $.
$d ps x $.
